# pixelFormat

**Instance Property**

The pixel format associated with the tile shading render pipeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/invalid].
